Your Job

Your boss even has a name for this system. He calls it the IIKH, the interactive Intelligent Kitchen Helper. Who knows where bosses get these names?

In any event, your boss is making it very clear that your job, even your position in the firm, is on the line. Your task is to develop the software that will implement the Interactive Intelligent Kitchen Helper.

[audio] 8 [real] 8 Text to accompany slide 8, in Chapter 2 of An Introduction to Object-Oriented Programming
